subs.text: @Neil_Sarg Bring it! I need a new phone soon. The USB-C port on my Pixel 4a 5G is worh out after just over a year. It's a struggle to charge it now. As in almost impossible. Frustrating.
subs.rawText: @Neil_Sarg Bring it! I need a new phone soon. The USB-C port on my Pixel 4a 5G is worh out after just over a year. It's a struggle to charge it now. As in almost impossible. Frustrating.

subs.text: @Neil_Sarg It doesn't support US bands. Not relevant to me. Unfortunately.
subs.rawText: @Neil_Sarg It doesn't support US bands. Not relevant to me. Unfortunately.

subs.text: Overwintering monarch butterflies in Mexico are an awesome site. Although the clusters are much smaller, overwintering monarchs at multiple sites in California including Pismo Beach State Park near me, are inspiring. This robot hummingbird is pretty cool! [link]
subs.rawText:
Overwintering monarch butterflies in Mexico are an awesome site. Although the clusters are much smaller, overwintering monarchs at multiple sites in California including Pismo Beach State Park near me, are inspiring.

This robot hummingbird is pretty cool! https://t.co/UGiqbMBb9C

subs.text: If you don't follow @isabel_cumming you are missing her ongoing series of lovely (!) images of Baltimore. Tell her "Happy birthday". [link]
subs.rawText:
If you don't follow @isabel_cumming you are missing her ongoing series of lovely (!) images of Baltimore.
